per_frame_init_1=dx_residual = 0;
per_frame_init_2=dy_residual = 0;
per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq30=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq30);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q30=mq30;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=wave_r = wave_r + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.437*time) + 0.40*sin(0.970*time) );
per_frame_19=wave_g = wave_g + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.344*time) + 0.40*sin(0.841*time) );
per_frame_20=wave_b = wave_b + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.251*time) + 0.40*sin(1.055*time) );
per_frame_21=rot = rot + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.579*time) );
per_frame_22=cx = cx + 0.210*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.40*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_23=cy = cy + 0.210*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_24=dx = dx + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_25=dy = dy + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.284*time) + 0.40*sin(0.247*time) );
per_frame_26=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%6,0);
per_frame_27=dx = dx + dx_residual*0.01;
per_frame_28=dy = dy + dy_residual*0.01;
per_frame_29=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_30=//dx_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2)*0.016*sin(time*7) + (1-equal(bass_thresh,2))*dx_residual;
per_frame_31=//dy_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2)*0.012*sin(time*9) + (1-equal(bass_thresh,2))*dy_residual;
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=// custom beat detection code: (fps-independent; quiet songs don't freak out)
per_frame_34=decay_rate = pow(0.993, fps);  // lower # = more hasty to declare a beat
per_frame_35=min_att    = 2.5;               // lower # = quieter songs can declare beats
per_frame_36=decay_to   = 1.0;               // lower # = more hasty to declare a beat
per_frame_37=beat =           bass/max(min_att,bass_att);
per_frame_38=beat = max(beat, mid /max(min_att,mid_att ));
per_frame_39=beat = max(beat, treb/max(min_att,treb_att));
per_frame_40=beat = max( beat, (prev_beat-decay_to)*decay_rate + decay_to );
per_frame_41=beat_level     = (beat - prev_beat - 0.1)*24;
per_frame_42=is_beat = above(beat_level, 0.5);
per_frame_43=prev_beat = beat;
per_frame_44=  dx_residual = dx_residual*(1-is_beat) + (is_beat)*(int(rand(100))*0.01*2-1);
per_frame_45=  dy_residual = dy_residual*(1-is_beat) + (is_beat)*(int(rand(100))*0.01*2-1);
warp_1=`shader_body {
warp_2=`
warp_3=`//uv = uv_orig;
warp_4=`float corr = texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw;
warp_5=`float2 uv1 = float2(uv.x-0.5,uv.y-0.5)*aspect.xy;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`float2 tmp = uv1;
warp_8=`tmp.x = ang*3; tmp.y = rad;
warp_9=`uv1 = tmp;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`float3 noise = (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq,corr*uv/2+q23)+1);
warp_12=`
warp_13=`float3 ret1 = GetBlur1 (uv)-.3;
warp_14=`float3 crisp = tex2D(sampler_main, uv+ret1*.01 ) + noise*0.1;
warp_15=`float3 blur = GetBlur1 (uv/4+.4*float2(.3*ret1.x,ret1.y)) - noise*.1;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`ret = -.4*blur + crisp;
warp_18=`    
warp_19=` ret *= 0.98 * pow(1-.01*q28*q28*rad,2); 
warp_20=`  ret -= 0.04;
warp_21=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_22=`                      ((uv1.xyy*q27
warp_23=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_24=`                      ).xyz*
warp_25=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_26=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_27=`                     );
warp_28=`if(ret.x> q21*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q24*roam_sin.x)ret.y -= (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_29=`if(ret.y> q22*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q25*roam_cos.x)ret.z -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_30=`if(ret.z> q23*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q26*roam_sin.y)ret.x -= (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_31=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_rand00;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`ret = tex2D(sampler_rand00, frac(1-GetBlur2(uv).yx*0.6 + time*float2(0.057,.036)))
comp_5=`*(1+GetPixel(uv).x + GetBlur1(uv).y)*0.4;
comp_6=`
comp_7=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_8=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_9=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_10=`                      ).xyz*
comp_11=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_12=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q30 
comp_13=`                     );
comp_14=`if(ret.x> q26*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q23*roam_sin.x)ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_15=`if(ret.y> q25*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q22*roam_cos.x)ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_16=`if(ret.z> q24*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q21*roam_sin.y)ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_17=`}
